captions.text: Where are the other two?
Stratton and Schoenstein?

We looked everywhere, sir, but...
Never mind. It doesn't matter.

You gentlemen seen
your midterm grades yet?

- Oh, they're not posted yet, sir.
- I've seen them.

Mr. Kroger,
two C's, two D's and an "F."

That's a 1.2 grade average.
Congratulations, Kroger.

You're at the top
of the Delta pledge class.

- Mr. Dorfman.
- Hello.
Zero point two.

Fat, drunk and stupid
is no way to go through life, son.

Mr. Hoover,
president of Delta House.

One point six.
Four C's and an "F."
<i>A fine example you set.</i>

Daniel Simpson Day...
has no grade point average.
<i>All courses incomplete.</i>
Mr. Blu...
Mr. Blutarsky.
Zero point zero.

I want you to tell Mr. Stratton
and Mr. Schoenstein...

exactly what I'm
about to tell you now.

- What's that, sir?
- You're out. Finished at Faber.

Expelled. I want you off
this campus at 9:00 Monday morning.

And I'm sure
you'll be happy to know...

that I have notified
your local draft boards...

and told them
that you are now all...

all eligible
for military service.
Well?
Well?
[Gasping]

- Out with it.
- [Retching]
<i>[Liquid Splashing]</i>

title: Animal House (8/10) Movie CLIP - Finished at Faber (1978) HD

inspirational speech (i.e. "Was it over when the Germans bombed Pearl

Wormer!" :^)
